text: 5 Tracks is second EP by multi-instrumentalist John Cale. It was released in May 2003. It was his first album on EMI Records label. Song called "Wilderness Approaching" features in the Ramin Niami movie Paris (2003). ==Track listing== All songs written by John Cale. ==Personnel== * John Cale − vocals, guitar, bass, keyboards, piano * Eden Cale − background vocals on "Verses" ==References== Category:John Cale albums Category:2003 albums Category:Rock albums
title: 5 Tracks
